description:
Playlist is all about… creating playlists! Allows you to create a playlist, add songs to it, reorganize song order, remove songs, and add to your now playing list without the need to pause your music. No longer do you need to create a playlist on your desktop and transfer it over to your phone, just create them on the go! All playlists are also played right within this app, so there is no need to jump between apps in order to create and listen to your playlists.

*Shuffle and repeat added in v1.1.0
*Minor UI updates in v1.2.0
*Audio issues resolved in v1.3.0
*Added dashboard in v1.4.0
*Dashboard improvements in v1.5.0
versionNote:
- Added backup and restore functionality
- Enhanced UI in the now playing scene
